sent.orig: What kind of breakfast does you like, American breakfast or Continental breakfast?
sent.trans: 您想要哪种早餐，美式早餐还是大陆式早餐？

sent.orig: Types: Buffet breakfast A la carte breakfast, Continental, Chinese, American breakfast set menus.
sent.trans: 类型：自助早餐，点餐式早餐，欧式、中式、美式。

sent.orig: Never work before breakfast; if you have to work before breakfast, get your breakfast.
sent.trans: 千万别在早饭前工作，如果必须在早饭前工作，就吃早饭吧。

sent.orig: Green spend two dollars to eat breakfast, or to street vendors to eat breakfast?
sent.trans: 花两元吃绿色早餐，还是到路边摊吃早餐？

sent.orig: Would you like a American Breakfast or a Continental Breakfast?
sent.trans: 请问您要美式早餐还是欧式早餐？
